page.title: 14A DAY IN MY LIFE pt2
page.content: come out then we go in.The servers serve out the food and scrape the plates. When we come down from dinner we play in the playground if we can go on the grass we usually play "Red Rover" or "Forty Forty".When we go back into the classroom we write about the Black Country Museum until twenty past two.Then it is playtime ,after that play Mr.Yeomans sometimes reads us a story.At half past three it is hometime and I walk home.When I get home I take my coat and shoes off and go into the kitchen to get a drink and a biscuit ,then go into the lounge to watch television because "Dogtannian" is on.When this is finished I usually have my tea,after tea I play a game and watch television or go outside and then get ready for bed.I read for a bit then I go to sleep.
